item.title: EKC 26 HAS BEEN RELEASED. NEW LOGO HAS BEEN ADDED AND BACKDROPSS HAVE BEEN CHANGED AS WE MOVE AWAY FROM OUR CHRISTMAS THEME. GAIA IS THE DEFAULT AGAIN AND ITS WORKING FAIRLY WELL. WHEN OPENLOAD PAIRING POPS UP YOU CAN EITHER LINK WITH A DEVICE BY GOING TO THAT WEBSITE OR JUST SIMPLY CLICK CANCEL AND IT WILL GO TO THE NEXT LINK. IF IT DOES NOT PLAY AT ALL PLEASE TRY ONE OF THE BACKUPS UNDER THAT SECTION. IF IT SAYS AUTO AT THE END THAT BACK UP IS SET TO AUTOPLAY. IF IT SAYS SELECT IT IS SET TO MANUALLY SELECT YOUR STREAM THE WAY TERRARIUM WAS.
DONATIONS ARE ALWAYS VERY APPRECIATED-IF YOU WOULD LIKE TO DONATE YOU CAN AT PAYPAL.ME/ELITEKUSTOMCONFIG - YOU CAN PURCHASE PRELOADED DEVICES AT ELITEKUSTOMCONFIG.COM

SIGN UP FOR GEARS TV FOR A PREMIUM LIVE CONTENT. PLEASE WATCH THE DEMO VIDEO UNDER THE GEARS SECTION TO SEE IT IN ACTION. SIGN UP AT ELITEKUSTOMCONFIG.COM/GEARSTV - THIS SERVICE IS AMAZING. GREAT GUIDE AS WELL.
THANK YOU ALL FOR YOUR SUPPORT. HAPPY STREAMING
IF YOU NEED ANY SUPPORT YOU CAN EMAIL ELITEKUSTOMCONFIG@GMAIL.COM OR MESSAGE US ON OUR FACEBOOK PAGE FACEBOOK.COM/ELITEKUSTOMCONFIG
